body.p: Which one of the following emails looks like a Trojan attack?

Please visit www.scwhab.bad-guy.ru and log in with your regular password because the standard login page is broken today.

I have 27 million dollars here in Spain. If you will send me your contact information to help me transfer the money to your account, I will be happy to give you 10% of it. Please help meâ€”you're my only hope!
We have detected a virus on your computer. Please download and run this program to remove it: SuperVirusChecker.exe.

response.feedback: This message is a phishing attempt.
This message is a phishing attempt.
This is just a scam, known as the "419 scam."
